solution_line_template: Wheel of Fortune is {wheel_multiplier}*{jeopardy_minutes}=<<{wheel_multiplier}*{jeopardy_minutes}={wheel_minutes}>>{wheel_minutes} minutes each.
So he watched it for {wheel_minutes}*{wheel_episodes}=<<{wheel_minutes}*{wheel_episodes}={wheel_total_minutes}>>{wheel_total_minutes} minutes.
So he watched {jeopardy_total_minutes}+{wheel_total_minutes}=<<{jeopardy_total_minutes}+{wheel_total_minutes}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes of TV.
That means he watched {total_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}=<<{total_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours of TV.
